it.polimi.se2018.networking.server

Interface ServerNetInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultNetInterface, DelegateNetInterface, RmiNetworkHandler, TcpNetworkHandler

    public interface ServerNetInterface
    The interface that contains the common features of the different servers. It is used to separate the use of the server from it's implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addClient(ClientNetInterface client)
      The method to add a client to the server.
      void removeClient(ClientNetInterface client)
      The method to remove a client from the server.
      void send(Message message)
      The method to send a message to the server.
